entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
